pages.text: Do you like phantoms? Well, you're gonna LOVE these then!$(br2)Lava Revenants are reconstructed forms of phantoms. These giant, hulking creatures take to the sky and circle a point over land, waiting for poor souls to near. Be wary, because they can blast through most structures! If you plan to hide, better build a quick wall with strong materials.
I suggest using an Elytra to navigate around these. You won't be able to outrun them.
